name: A Trail Of Blood
description:
Based on A Trail Of Blood (book)

A Trail Of Blood is a story based, crime-fiction game using fictional detectives, Sherlock Holmes(Credit goes to Sir Arthur Conan Doyle), Hercule Poirot(Credit goes to Agatha Christie) and Gustave Moreau( Credit goes to me :D ). 

These three detectives have been caught at the heart of a murder done by one of the three. Play the game and go through the investigation to find out whodunnit.
